uk.ac.brighton.uni.ab607.mmorpg.common

Class GameCharacter

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.brighton.uni.ab607.mmorpg.common.GameCharacter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.almasb.common.graphics.Drawable, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enemy, Player

    public abstract class GameCharacter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, com.almasb.common.graphics.Drawable
    Essentially alive game object Enemies/NPCs/players
    Author:
    Almas Baimagambetov
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
